text: La Mesa is a city in San Diego County. It is east of Downtown San Diego in Southern California. The population was 61,121 at the 2020 census. Its civic motto is "the Jewel of the Hills." == References == == Other websites == *Official website of the city of La Mesa *La Mesa Village Merchants Association *City-Data.com *La Mesa Community Website Category:1912 establishments in California Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Diego County, California
title: La Mesa, California
